Name: Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 3
About the game: A new sequel to the game 'Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven'. Mysterious atmosphere created by a great writer. Mesmerizing otherworldly world! The game has 200 levels, divided into 20 locations. For a good game you will get a lot of unusual trophies. A large number of levels will allow you to enjoy the game for several hours every day! Unique game balance and complexity of levels will allow you to enjoy the game and strain your mind. - 200 levels in 20 locations - Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards! - Use the joker when in difficulty - Combo multiplier, get more coins! - 15 mystical rewards! - Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
